title: Defective accessories in package
description: I have sent it to my parents in India and once it was mounted they figured out it's not working as intended. One of the pipes were leaked and gas leaked out of it. They had to spend another Rs.6000/- to fix it. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone and won't recommend high value product purchase from Amazon.

title: Simple NO to prospective buyers
description: Brand is Hitachi. Installation is headache. You need to followup with them every hour to know status othewise they will be installing surely after 10 days of delivery so that your replacement option is gone.

title: Saves electricity, cools well
description: It's been just over a month of using this unit, and I run it at 40%. That is enough for more than adequate cooling at 24°C. Having switched from a 12-year-old 1.5T Haier AC for 15 days of the last billing cycle, the consumption dropped by 70 units compared to the previous month - despite 2nd half of May being hotter than April 2022, and usage being more.

title: Beautiful classy energy efficient Ac
description: I Bought two window Ac's 4star (PWQ18WUXA) & this 5star model ( PWQ18WUZA) from offline store in may22 .Trust me this 5star model is much better than the 4star. Because of high cooling capacity(5000watts). 4star model(cooling capacity 4700watts) only good for small size rooms. It won't give you immediate cooling experience.

title: LG AC is very nice But Installation Guys were worse.
description: Product is very good I love LG Products but i can't believe that how Such a brand can hire low trained personnel to install the AC. Installation guys were not trained enough. He bent copper pipe without any tool in an unacceptable way. They haven't foaming soap , nut bolts, working vaccum pump, fastners etc and were not wearing any brand oriented uniform. Totally nonsense. I am still amazed and surprisingly thinking that whats going on this. I would give 1 star to this ac because of this but no doubt AC is good thats why i gave 3 stars. Please LG reform your installation experience. It should look professional in every way.

description: Product is very good I love LG Products but i can't believe that how Such a brand can hire low trained personnel to install the AC. Installation guys were not trained enough. He bent copper pipe without any tool in an unacceptable way. They haven't foaming soap , nut bolts, working vaccum pump, fastners etc and were not wearing any brand oriented uniform. Totally nonsense. I am still amazed and surprisingly thinking that whats going on this. I would give 1 star to this ac because of this but no doubt AC is good thats why i gave 3 stars. Please LG reform your installation experience. It should look professional in every way.

title: Worst experience of my life buying an air conditioner
description: Purchased this unit and I must say this is the worst decision I have ever made. First of all the technician who came to install the unit fixed a broken unit that got delivered to me. The body the filters and even the unit inside was damaged. The unit was leaking in the house. The technician didn't even bother to check the unit for 15 to 20 minutes like the should. Got anoter indoor unit  replaced and guess what the unit worked for 2 days and stopped working. Now when I put on the unt it makes a very loud noise like something is hitting the blades. Getting the service centre to come and repair is another task. They don't bother just attend the call because they have to. Absolutely no customer service. They don't even clean up after they have finished the job. I have to tell them to clean and they behave like they are doing you a favor. Worst company ever. Please do not waste your money on this porduct or any Hitachi porducts have a feeling everything is made in China of 3rd quality products. Hitachi is just a name of the past now nothing else.

The body the filters and even the unit inside was damaged. The unit was leaking in the house. The technician didn't even bother to check the unit for 15 to 20 minutes like the should. Got anoter indoor unit  replaced and guess what the unit worked for 2 days and stopped working. Now when I put on the unt it makes a very loud noise like something is hitting the blades. Getting the service centre to come and repair is another task. They don't bother just attend the call because they have to. Absolutely no customer service. They don't even clean up after they have finished the job. I have to tell them to clean and they behave like they are doing you a favor. Worst company ever. Please do not waste your money on this porduct or any Hitachi porducts have a feeling everything is made in China of 3rd quality products. Hitachi is just a name of the past now nothing else.

title: Cooling issues, defective compressor.
description: So disappointed with the two .. 1 ton Hitachi A/Cs I bought from Amazon. One problem after the other arises. Not recommend .

title: Worst service of Hitachi
description: So this is my 5th day experience. Ac was delivered the next day of the order butI had to chase the brand service centre guy for the installation. Post the installation and after an hour of running, all water is dropping inside the room. Complained again through customer care (that is hard to reach after multiple try). The guy who came for the installation asked to contact the service centre owner. Service centre owner not picking up the phone. If nobody comes in 2 days I'm gonna return the item to amazon with a loss of 3000 on the installation. Also, service centre guy tells that if you are not taking installation from the brand you will not get the warranty however after confirmation from Hitachi and Amazon, they still cover no matter where you get the installation done from.

title: Pathetic product!!! The Seller DAWNTECH ELECTRONICS PRIVATE LIMITED is a big big thug.
description: Horrible product!!! First the seller DAWNTECH ELECTRONICS PRIVATE LIMITED looted us of our money by stealing the copper wire kit supposed to come with the Ac. After paying extra to the authorised installation person for the copper pipe the HITACHI 1.5 ton 3star inverter spilt Ac didn’t work only. Pathetic product. Horrible  experience. Don’t recommend it to anyone. I have lost my money but I can at least I can  save others by not falling for such thug seller DAWNTECH ELECTRONICS PRIVATE LIMITED. STOP LOOTING PEOPLE.

The guy who came for the installation asked to contact the service centre owner. Service centre owner not picking up the phone. If nobody comes in 2 days I'm gonna return the item to amazon with a loss of 3000 on the installation. Also, service centre guy tells that if you are not taking installation from the brand you will not get the warranty however after confirmation from Hitachi and Amazon, they still cover no matter where you get the installation done from.

title: Worst service Hitachi.
description: Hitachi ke AC Bkwaas hai.please koi na purchase karein. Complaint krne pr bhi koi technician nahi aata.Kyonki ye third party se repair krate hai jo bina paise ke fault thik nahi krte.Na hi inki installation thik hai.Outdoor high noice krta hai, pr koi sunwai nahi hai. Is company ko to black list kr dena chahiye.

title: Worst service of Hitachi
description: So this is my 5th day experience. Ac was delivered the next day of the order butI had to chase the brand service centre guy for the installation. Post the installation and after an hour of running, all water is dropping inside the room. Complained again through customer care (that is hard to reach after multiple try). The guy who came for the installation asked to contact the service centre owner. Service centre owner not picking up the phone. If nobody comes in 2 days I'm gonna return the item to amazon with a loss of 3000 on the installation. Also, service centre guy tells that if you are not taking installation from the brand you will not get the warranty however after confirmation from Hitachi and Amazon, they still cover no matter where you get the installation done from.

title: Deceiving
description: The seller assumes that the outdoor unit will be mounted on air as the mount bracket is not included. Better to buy offline as they install for free and the mounting bracket is given free of charge.

title: Worst service Hitachi.
description: Hitachi ke AC Bkwaas hai.please koi na purchase karein. Complaint krne pr bhi koi technician nahi aata.Kyonki ye third party se repair krate hai jo bina paise ke fault thik nahi krte.Na hi inki installation thik hai.Outdoor high noice krta hai, pr koi sunwai nahi hai. Is company ko to black list kr dena chahiye.

title: Faulty Product and Customer Service is not good.
description: Outer unit stopped working after 4 days of installation, called the customer care and raised the complaint, they give the resolution time of 48 hours but even after 3 days no updates. When called the customer care, all they say is to wait.

title: WORST RESPONSE FROM PANASONIC ON COMPLAIN AGAINST OVERPRICED INSTALLTION
description: It's too early to comment on performance of AC as it's just been 15 days of installation. However, I would like to mention "WORST RESPONSE" from Panasonic Co., side on installation concern. They don't take any cognizance on complain against Installation agencies who charge exorbitant price for installation accessories. If you wish to provide them installation accessories from your side , they will increase installation charges arbitrarily and blatantly say "Its Co Policy". I made several complains to Panasonic against such overpriced installation services but they remain mum for two days. Ultimately I had to get the installation done at a very high price.

title: AC not working.
description: The AC turns out as NOT WORKING upon installation. Registering a complaint with Lloyd/ Havells was absolutely not easy and after inspection with the service person it was confirmed to be defective. I was told that they will try to repair the same but it will take about 4 days before the repair could be attempted since they did not have the required spares.

description: Very delicate. The outer cover is very thin. The supply wire is only 1 sq mm. The outlet to drain pipe is above the floor of ac which will rust the floor. So pls call after getting delivery of ac . overhaul ac is good

title: DONT BUT PANASONIC
description: Don’t buy this product.. I’m regretting purchasing Panasonic.. it cools like a 3 yr old AC … there’s nothing brand new about this AC … except the gimmicks …Panasonic took forever to install this and even after that I’m not happy with its performance at all .. I went for this product after watching reviews and recommendations online but it’s looks like all it’s features are bloody gimmicks and lies just like all the paid reviews by influencers online .. just go for Daikin guys if you have the budget for this product .. screw Panasonic .. I feel cheated and feel like I’ve burned my hard earned money (I can’t believe they charged me 13k for installation ..feels like a bloody scam)

title: Never buy big items from online stores
description: Terrible experience with this supplier, received a defective outdoor unit, took 13 days to get a replacement, Amazon has such poor customer support they don’t reply, no way to contact customer care, panasonic says contact amazon, Amazon system shows customer care is calling you but don’t receive any call, after so much frustration and paying 7500 for installation this is my last purchase from Amazon and Panasonic. If new product has problem don’t know how long it will last. Buy something else.

title: Powerful features, Very Good!
description: The air purifier and Virus killer modes can be activated in all modes, including the fan mode. Installation was  on time and free of cost. They charged me for the extra drain and ac stand. Installation went smooth, Using it for a few days now and its very good. Go for it!!!

title: Want to know your current room temperature ?
description: This ac if you set it to FAN Mode... you can see room temperature and by observing it for  a period of time you will know how fast room temperature increases and how much you can tolerate . For example i was ok till 33*c room temperature and after that i felt the heat inside my room and it was time set the AC to cool mode.

title: Decent budget option for upto upto 10ft/10ft room

title: The cooling is good but the outdoor unit is too noisy.
description: The cooling is really good but the noise from the outdoor is too loud and irritating, especially at the lower temperatures. I have other brands ac as well and the sound from them is much lower as compared to this model. The technician obviously told that it is normal to sound this much.

I checked if they done their work properly and found out that they did not even put the filters in the AC. I had to put them myself. Clearly they did not have experience. They finished the job in a rush to fix AC for other customer. Overall, not satisfied with the installation team.

title: Poor support and not a great AC
description: 1. First of all its not an invertor AC, invertor AC consumes ~30-35% less energy compared to non-invertor AC. It is not cheap, you could get 1 ton invertor AC if spend additional 2k.

title: Amazing
description: Writing review after 45 days of purchase. Nice product. Fully satisfied, gives very good feel inside room. But remember its compressor starts after 3 minutes, so it takes a bit more time than my Voltas a.c. fitted in another room. Difference is that for Voltas you shut all the doors and windows then start the a.c. And for Daikin you start the ac first then close the door and windows!!!

title: The service provided by Daikin is atrocious
description: Though the AC is good but the service provided by the company supremely bad. The split AC was installed on time but due to the lack of expertise of the mechanic water keeps falling from the door unit. And no body is picking up even the phone forget about rectifying the issue. Even the email sent to Daikin for providing service has gone unnoticed.

title: Horrible Amazon customer support
description: For installation, I had to call multiple times. Very pathetic customer support from Amazon.

title: Extremely bad customer service
description: The AC is throwing current through its Earthing wire, which is in turn getting carried to our other devices and sockets in our home. I raised a request to customer care. After waiting for 9 days, the technician sent an associate of his to my home and he checked the outer connections and came to the conclusion that there's no proper earthing at our home. But we have already checked that with our local electrician and he confirmed our earthing is okay. The technician checked with his tools and got voltage on the body, but they kept sticking to their initial statement, that the earthing of our home is faulty. They even said it's by design that an inverter AC will constantly throw current through the earthing wire which is completely unacceptable.

title: Very bad experiance
description: It cools the small room very late and slow.

title: Amazing
description: Writing review after 45 days of purchase. Nice product. Fully satisfied, gives very good feel inside room. But remember its compressor starts after 3 minutes, so it takes a bit more time than my Voltas a.c. fitted in another room. Difference is that for Voltas you shut all the doors and windows then start the a.c. And for Daikin you start the ac first then close the door and windows!!!

The technician checked with his tools and got voltage on the body, but they kept sticking to their initial statement, that the earthing of our home is faulty. They even said it's by design that an inverter AC will constantly throw current through the earthing wire which is completely unacceptable.

title: Very Poor. DO NOT BUY - Installation is big issue
description: We bought this thinking this is high end. But the dealer in between who had to install it did such a bad job. The entire pipe used is of bad quality, the water is leaking, the AC unit is faulty as well. We are so so disappointed we have lost trust . Its better to go for normal mid range AC which has good service because once you buy something which is faulty and so expensive the heart is broken.

title: Very Poor. DO NOT BUY - Installation is big issue
description: We bought this thinking this is high end. But the dealer in between who had to install it did such a bad job. The entire pipe used is of bad quality, the water is leaking, the AC unit is faulty as well. We are so so disappointed we have lost trust . Its better to go for normal mid range AC which has good service because once you buy something which is faulty and so expensive the heart is broken.

title: Pathetic after sales service. PCB issue after one month of purchase
description: Product and After sales service of Panasonic is pathetic. PCB issue arose within 1month of use. Upon service request Technician found issue with PCB he told me that they will order new PCB for Ac, instead of ordering new PCB he closed the service request without my approval. Panasonic issue OTP to customer to close the request but technician closed request from the backend. I can't see the purpose of issuing OTP to customer. Last Panasonic product for me.

title: Don’t buy it
description: Worst experience buying from Amazon as well as LG product. We chose this product thinking that it is the best ac in the market but no it is the worst. Compressor is not cutting off. So what saving in  electricity bill my foot.  I have to adjust the room temperature. Room is not getting cold. Water is leaking. Leaking problem will be sold soon but what about compressor. May be i got the faulty piece. I want to exchange. Actually i wanna return it but that’s not possible. I would not recommend this product at free of cost also bcoz who gonna pay for heavy electricity bill. No compressor cut off so it directly effects the electricity consumption.

title: All temp settings are same
description: I am using this on top floor building house. 100² feet room size. From 16°C to 29°C degree settings, its one and the same. At 30°C compressor stops and it becomes really hot inside. So its either very cool or hot, you can't get any intermediate temp settings. Also i have to adjust the up down swings myself because it doesn't go full up or down by remote. My bed is really close and below it. Outdoor unit is very silent and indoor is ultra silent

title: Won't recommend
description: The cooling is not even closer to the other LG Airconditioner I have. Even the technician agreed that the older models were good, sturdy, and cooler than the new generation Airconditioner. The AC will only do the up-down swing, the side swing doesn't work. So, if you want to feel the AC temperature then you have to position yourself in front of the unit and still switch on the ceiling fans and pedestal fans. Waste of money in this perticular model. I bought this because the earlier ACs were good.

description: Do not buy lg AC they are charging Rs 3000 for installation and if you buy ac outside unit it will be 200 extra, if bought by lg then it will be free but qwality is just disgusting and also lg people are not professional, they will do what ever they have to do, they won't listen to anyone or any thing,

title: Won't recommend
description: The cooling is not even closer to the other LG Airconditioner I have. Even the technician agreed that the older models were good, sturdy, and cooler than the new generation Airconditioner. The AC will only do the up-down swing, the side swing doesn't work. So, if you want to feel the AC temperature then you have to position yourself in front of the unit and still switch on the ceiling fans and pedestal fans. Waste of money in this perticular model. I bought this because the earlier ACs were good.

title: Perfect and really energy efficient for my use case.
description: I required an AC for around 200sq. ft room where direct sunlight only falls in the morning till 10'o clock. Middle floor. My use case was for daily usage of around 14 hrs mixing my work hours and sleep hours at 27-28°C for ambient comfort (Shimla not desired). In current season, using it in monsoon mode mostly mixing it with occasional cool mode for the right ambient balance. I have seen the the usage going as low as 290W. So for my use case, it is working perfectly. will suggest the same model with wifi, remote would not be required at all then and UI of app is also good & functional. One of my worries was missing components from the packaging like copper pipes as many have reviewed and complained before. But nothing was missing in my case. Fixing the indoor unit, Outdoor stand setup, Connecting with stabilizer and a drill hole during cost me ₹1700. 1500 was fixed installation charges about which I was informed beforehand and 200 for outdoor stand fixing as per the described charges. Installation was done same day of delivery. So all in all happy with the product currently.

In current season, using it in monsoon mode mostly mixing it with occasional cool mode for the right ambient balance. I have seen the the usage going as low as 290W. So for my use case, it is working perfectly. will suggest the same model with wifi, remote would not be required at all then and UI of app is also good & functional. One of my worries was missing components from the packaging like copper pipes as many have reviewed and complained before. But nothing was missing in my case. Fixing the indoor unit, Outdoor stand setup, Connecting with stabilizer and a drill hole during cost me ₹1700. 1500 was fixed installation charges about which I was informed beforehand and 200 for outdoor stand fixing as per the described charges. Installation was done same day of delivery. So all in all happy with the product currently.

title: Product is Wonderful but Installation Service is Shabby
description: The product is amazing. Low Noise, Quick Cooling, About efficiency its quite energy efficient. Speaking of Installation, the cost is very high. They charge ridiculous amount for extra items like copper pipe and drain pipe. Even after doing that I face water leak issue and now the installation guy asking me to modify the drain outlet through plumber. Really ridiculous.

They charge ridiculous amount for extra items like copper pipe and drain pipe. Even after doing that I face water leak issue and now the installation guy asking me to modify the drain outlet through plumber. Really ridiculous.

title: Horrible product . Not working till date. Horrible service from Amazon n lg
description: Bought the product on 20th April. Installation guys said there is some problem with compressor. They took 4 days to change it and after that also it was not working. They said it's electrical problem. Electrician checked and said everything is fine and problem is with AC. Ordered for replacement before time. Still the issues is not resolved and product is not replaced. The purpose of buying the ac is defeated. Till not the lg service guys (aarush electronics) say that replacement is under process. It's been almost 30 days from the delivery of the product and till now I have not received a replacement. We cannot reach Amazon customer care as well. Ridiculous service from Amazon and lg. Don't know when I will get the replacement. Plz don't buy a lg product as their service is horrible. Don't like saying his but very disappointed with Amazon as well.  Not able to contact them regarding this product at all.

title: Lg inverter AC 👍
description: I got this product delivered on 19 March 2022 installation was effortless lg customer care contacted me .Now the biggest issue for me was weather this product coll my hall because I live in an old house which has 18 feet high ceiling.But yes this product works like charm reduce the temperature in my hall although it takes some time which is obvious .Now electricity consumption part comes which is again preety gud with lg inverter AC as it doesn't consumes to much electricity and i am observing only  20% hike in my monthly bill which is delightful on moderate usage of three to four hour  between 80 to 60 % capacity.

title: Good product with effective cooling
description: I recently purchased this AC and till now I'm pretty satisfied with its performance. During daytime at peak temperature of 43 degrees Celsius, it is effectively cooling a 180sq ft room on top floor. Earlier I was using a 1.5 ton ac in the same room and in afternoon, that AC used to stop working but not this one.

title: Good brand, good cooling.
description: Writing this after 1 month of uses. I used Hitachi 1.5 ton window AC since last 8 years. those were flawless. So, i opted 2.0 ton split for bigger room. 180sq ft room is chilled in 8 - 15 minutes. Adequate cooling, low noise level, and what else you need? Only thing is - it has no display (LED) on inner unit. Remote is classy, has short cuts to every mode for easy operation.

title: Beware of the actual capacity mentioned on Amazon web page and the one delivered
description: On Amazon web page the capacity of Hitachi Split AC was mentioned as 2 Ton whereas the actual capacity of the AC delivered was 1.8 Ton only.  Hence beware of such misleading information available on Amazon webpage.

description: On Amazon web page the capacity of Hitachi Split AC was mentioned as 2 Ton whereas the actual capacity of the AC delivered was 1.8 Ton only.  Hence beware of such misleading information available on Amazon webpage.

title: Good brand, good cooling.
description: Writing this after 1 month of uses. I used Hitachi 1.5 ton window AC since last 8 years. those were flawless. So, i opted 2.0 ton split for bigger room. 180sq ft room is chilled in 8 - 15 minutes. Adequate cooling, low noise level, and what else you need? Only thing is - it has no display (LED) on inner unit. Remote is classy, has short cuts to every mode for easy operation.

title: Good brand, good cooling.
description: Writing this after 1 month of uses. I used Hitachi 1.5 ton window AC since last 8 years. those were flawless. So, i opted 2.0 ton split for bigger room. 180sq ft room is chilled in 8 - 15 minutes. Adequate cooling, low noise level, and what else you need? Only thing is - it has no display (LED) on inner unit. Remote is classy, has short cuts to every mode for easy operation.

title: Bad experience
description: The item delivery and installation was fast. We got the AC installed within2 days of delivery, but within next 20 days the AC had issues like the electric line was tripping, the cooling had stopped, it was throwing E6 error. It’s super frustrating when a brand new product starts giving you trouble. The service team fixed it.

title: Never make the mistake of buying Voltas ac
description: I bought voltas inverter ac on 24 april. It was installed two days later. On 29th may it stopped working. I raised a complaint and was told that PCB has gone bad. After that started series of complaints on phone and Twitter. Voltas after sales service is so pathetic. They dont care at all. The technician come and say that the ac is fine. The problem is wity the stabilizer and with the voltage in the society. There is no issue with either the stabilizer or voltage. I was using LG ac 1.5 ton before voltas. It worked without any issues, same house, same stabilizer. The voltage is consistent at 250. How is that an issue.

After that started series of complaints on phone and Twitter. Voltas after sales service is so pathetic. They dont care at all. The technician come and say that the ac is fine. The problem is wity the stabilizer and with the voltage in the society. There is no issue with either the stabilizer or voltage. I was using LG ac 1.5 ton before voltas. It worked without any issues, same house, same stabilizer. The voltage is consistent at 250. How is that an issue.

title: Plzzzzzz.....don't buy this ac
description: I purchased this AC in April 2022. Since last 12 days or so it's stopped cooling. Made a complaint with customer care. Technicians came after 2 days told me they need to replace ECM. Thereafter it's been 10 days with constant reminders and calls but part is still not available. I am living in Delhi and this Ac is installed in my mother's room. It's unbearable hot. My 34 grands down the drain. Please don't buy this voltas ac's.

title: Cooling issue
description: We brought this ac last year April and from starting onwards room is not getting cool and in 1 year service the customer service said gas is gone and he filled the gas and after 1 month still it's the same issue I think product has a issue today I called customer care and they said your 1 year warranty has been finished it's just been 20 days after 1 year warranty and it's a absolute failure and I won't recommend this product. Amazon please help me to get it sorted.

title: Cooling issue
description: We brought this ac last year April and from starting onwards room is not getting cool and in 1 year service the customer service said gas is gone and he filled the gas and after 1 month still it's the same issue I think product has a issue today I called customer care and they said your 1 year warranty has been finished it's just been 20 days after 1 year warranty and it's a absolute failure and I won't recommend this product. Amazon please help me to get it sorted.

title: Don't buy online! Copper pipe, nuts, holders nothing provided with AC

description: I have been a Voltas AC customer since years now. First the regular split AC to inverter split ACs. The remotes have always been delicate but the ACs are good. This model though is the worst. Started giving trouble in the first week of usage. The Voltas service engineers informed us that this model is troublesome. There are issues with the motor and wiring.

title: Pathetic product and after sale service
description: With 2 n half month of installation the colling is gone and water leakage. Sometimes even ice would fall from the AC.  Complaint raised with Hairer team where the technician are manipulative and only try to fool around asking money when informed product is within warranty period they are delaying the fixing of the issue and it's been a week now i don't have any proper support. I have had 2 Onida ACs out of which 1 has been replaced with Haier but with Onida never did I ever had any problems in the past 10 yrs. Wouldn't suggest this product to anyone especially for the after sale issue.

description: With 2 n half month of installation the colling is gone and water leakage. Sometimes even ice would fall from the AC.  Complaint raised with Hairer team where the technician are manipulative and only try to fool around asking money when informed product is within warranty period they are delaying the fixing of the issue and it's been a week now i don't have any proper support. I have had 2 Onida ACs out of which 1 has been replaced with Haier but with Onida never did I ever had any problems in the past 10 yrs. Wouldn't suggest this product to anyone especially for the after sale issue.

title: Not responding the customer care
description: I have reach out to the customer care more than 15 times, and created more than 10 tickets to resolve Noise  issue on my AC. But the customer care team never get back to me.

title: Not responding the customer care
description: I have reach out to the customer care more than 15 times, and created more than 10 tickets to resolve Noise  issue on my AC. But the customer care team never get back to me.

title: Good AC but incapable customer service and installation services
description: Good Product. Good cooling. No need to run ac whole night. Use the sleep option. No voice heard as the cooling unit is installed outside. There is no annoying neon lights on the blower as seen in the several other models. It is worth for Rs. 36k. Customer service is very dreadful. Booking the installation service over phone itself was a nightmare. Calls got disconnected while talking to the customer service. Tried Messaging service which was crashing very often. In that process end up in registering twice for single item. A day wasted in that process. Received a call on third day morning from a Hitachi technician about his assignment to install my ac but didn't give a definite or probable time. Waited for whole day carrying my phone wherever I moved in my house but around 5 pm a person from Hitachi customer service called and started blaming me that I was not attending phone and forced me to give back mouthful as the contention was a lie. On third day morning two other technicians called but they arrived after 1 pm. These Hitachi technicians were very horrible as they were leaving out the things which are not in their schedule even it was essential. As I had a fair idea about the nitty gritty of the installation of a c  I had to categorically tell them the things which are essential but not in the installation schedule of Hitachi  should be done even if it costs extra which will be paid. While attaching wires with naked ends at terminals when questioned why the ends naked and not crimped with sockets only to be told that Hitachi don't supply it. But, I found the crimping sockets next day in the cardboard package before I threw out. There is no clarity about scheduled maintenance under the warrantee period.

Booking the installation service over phone itself was a nightmare. Calls got disconnected while talking to the customer service. Tried Messaging service which was crashing very often. In that process end up in registering twice for single item. A day wasted in that process. Received a call on third day morning from a Hitachi technician about his assignment to install my ac but didn't give a definite or probable time. Waited for whole day carrying my phone wherever I moved in my house but around 5 pm a person from Hitachi customer service called and started blaming me that I was not attending phone and forced me to give back mouthful as the contention was a lie. On third day morning two other technicians called but they arrived after 1 pm. These Hitachi technicians were very horrible as they were leaving out the things which are not in their schedule even it was essential. As I had a fair idea about the nitty gritty of the installation of a c  I had to categorically tell them the things which are essential but not in the installation schedule of Hitachi  should be done even if it costs extra which will be paid. While attaching wires with naked ends at terminals when questioned why the ends naked and not crimped with sockets only to be told that Hitachi don't supply it. But, I found the crimping sockets next day in the cardboard package before I threw out. There is no clarity about scheduled maintenance under the warrantee period.

title: Product Quality is Poor,it will last only for 2 years  after that any issue,you need to buy new one.
description: I bought 1.5 Ton Bluestar AC and it needed Mother board( Cost 20000) replacement after 2 years of use.  Warranty only covers for 1 year, so i need to pay from my hand 20000 when i bought this AC at 46000. Service is Fraud and Company is worst and no integrity towards customer.

title: Stopped working after 1 day, faulty board, waiting for 1 month
description: Amazon will point to dealer, dealer to company, and company assures exchange of faulty unit, but 1 month already passed after multiple follow ups, horrible experience

title: A great product from LG
description: Bought this AC last year and have had enough experience with it to claim its one of the best ones out there. The sound levels are much lower though don't expect Split AC quietness; and the cooling performance is simply marvelous, as it can cope up with our summers without a hiccup. Electricity usage too is great and overall change in the facia of the AC is a welcome change.

title: Pathetic service by Voltas.
description: The AC was delivered to me on Sunday morning (though I asked it to be delivered after 12 but they forced me to get it at 9 in the morning). I am yet to use at as Voltas is a pathetic company who doesn't gives two hoots about installing the product. It was supposed to be installed a day after but it has been 2 days and nobody has reached out to me, their customer service team is unprofessional and keeps telling me someone will call or give me numbers for technicians who never pick up the call. I have never seen such a pathetic service by an electronic appliances provider.

I am yet to use at as Voltas is a pathetic company who doesn't gives two hoots about installing the product. It was supposed to be installed a day after but it has been 2 days and nobody has reached out to me, their customer service team is unprofessional and keeps telling me someone will call or give me numbers for technicians who never pick up the call. I have never seen such a pathetic service by an electronic appliances provider.
